00020 public class UtilsTest {

00022         private final URI readableFile = URI.createFileURI("./Resources/testing/demo.simulink");

00025         private final URI registeredMetamodel = URI.createURI("http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace");

00033         public void testIsReadable() {

00062                         Utils.validateReadableURI( readableFile );
